titles.title: No Mandates Act
No Mandates Act
To prohibit COVID19 vaccination mandates, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, and in addition to the Committees on House Administration, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
